h_text_align=”left” v_text_align=”center” image_loading=”default” flip_direction=”horizontal-to-left” front_content=”

CONNECT AT
THE SLUSH STREET
AFTERWORKS

” min_height=”40vh”]The official Slush Street Afterworks are taking place in the heart of Helsinki, in the legendary Mummotunneli at Aleksanterinkatu 46, and everyone in Helsinki is free to join.

 

When the doors close at Messukeskus on Wednesday, Nov 29, and Thursday, Nov 30, there will be 13,000 world-changers planning their next move, including 3,000 investors and 5,000 founders. Head over to The Slush Street, and who knows who you’ll bump into.[/nectar_flip_box][nectar_cta btn_style=”see-through” heading_tag=”h4″ button_color=”default” text_color=”#fafafa” text_color_hover=”#75fe72″ button_border_thickness=”0px” link_type=”new_tab” alignment=”center” alignment_tablet=”default” alignment_phone=”default” constrain_group_3=”yes” constrain_group_4=”yes” display=”block” display_tablet=”inherit” display_phone=”inherit” link_text=”JOIN US AT THE SLUSH STREET” url=”https://platform.slush.org/public/slush23/side-events/0c46ed72-4fab-4baf-b772-78970f6dbfec” padding_top=”10px” padding_bottom=”10px” padding_left=”20px” padding_right=”20px” margin_top=”20px” font_size_desktop=”18px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”default” gradient_type=”default”][nectar_flip_box image_url_1=”3864″ bg_color=”#101010″ bg_color_overlay=”true” text_color=”light” icon_color=”accent-color” bg_color_2=”#101010″ text_color_2=”light” h_text_align=”left” v_text_align=”center” image_loading=”default” flip_direction=”horizontal-to-left” front_content=”

ATTEND SLUSH
SIDE EVENTS

” min_height=”40vh”]Did you know that Slush doesn’t just exist inside the walls of Messukeskus? Helsinki is bustling with Side Events organized by community players, partners, and other organizations, and most of them don’t require a Slush Pass to join.

 

Dive into our selection of Side Events, find the ones labelled no ticket required, and delve into the Slush Magic by connecting and learning with those most relevant to you.[/nectar_flip_box][nectar_cta btn_style=”see-through” heading_tag=”h4″ button_color=”default” text_color=”#fafafa” text_color_hover=”#75fe72″ button_border_thickness=”0px” link_type=”new_tab” alignment=”center” alignment_tablet=”default” alignment_phone=”default” constrain_group_3=”yes” constrain_group_4=”yes” display=”block” display_tablet=”inherit” display_phone=”inherit” link_text=”EXPLORE SIDE EVENTS” url=”https://platform.slush.org/public/slush23/side-events” padding_top=”10px” padding_bottom=”10px” padding_left=”20px” padding_right=”20px” margin_top=”20px” font_size_desktop=”18px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_flip_box image_url_1=”5958″ bg_color=”#101010″ bg_color_overlay=”true” text_color=”light” icon_color=”accent-color” bg_color_2=”#101010″ text_color_2=”light” h_text_align=”left” v_text_align=”center” image_loading=”default” flip_direction=”horizontal-to-left” front_content=”

WATCH THE SLUSH
STAGE PROGRAM
ONLINE

” icon_size=”0″ min_height=”40vh”]Founder Stage at Slush will host some of the world’s leading minds and unmatched talent in startups and tech? The stage will be filled with two days full of inspiring lessons from seasoned founders, the next unicorns pitching for a 1M€ investment, and much more.

 

Tune in and watch the whole Founder Stage Program live on Nov 30 and Dec 1 from 10 am to 6 pm (EET).[/nectar_flip_box][nectar_cta btn_style=”see-through” heading_tag=”h4″ button_color=”default”
